pageTitle: Private Lessons | Private Sessions | Timberline Lodge
textBeforeTable: Front-of-the-line, complimentary lift privileges are included during Private Sessions, as well as access via the exclusive Express Lane at the Ski & Ride School and Rental Shop. Our dedicated staff can elevate your skills and offer expertise on a wide variety of topics including equipment choice and the best runs on a powder day! Reservations are recommended. Private Sessions Timberline’s private sessions offer the ultimate ski and snowboarding lesson experience. Design your own private lessons to meet your individual goals and preferred learning style. / Private Sessions Ski and Snowboard Lessons / Lessons / Ski Area / Home Private Sessions
textAfterTable: Early/Late Special One hour private lessons from 9:00 – 10:00am and 3:00 – 4:00pm only. Reservations are required. $80 first person; $40 each additional person. Lift Ticket Upgrade Get a full day lift ticket for use the same day as your lesson. Adult – $30, Child/Junior – $20 Rentals with Private Lessons Adult – $25 (skis or snowboard) Child/Junior – $15 (skis or snowboard) Night Lessons Night private lessons are available when area is open for night skiing/riding. 72 hour advance reservations are required. Offered seven days a week. Reservations are required minimum of 72 hours in advance. This program is designed for ALL skill levels See our “Find The Right Lesson” page for more details on which lesson is best for various skill levels. Contact Us Still have questions? Rather talk to a human than sift through information on the computer? We’re with you, and we’re just a quick phone call or email away… Call 503-272-3341 Email Us BOOK YOUR LESSON ONLINE
